attributes.action: Give the British Veterans who are on the street a place in a hotel.
attributes.additional_details: I believe that every single person should never feel alone, especially this Christmas. So I think that the British people on the streets who have to beg just to get basic necessities should be allowed a place to call home.
attributes.background: I believe that the government should give the British people who are on the streets free places in hotels like they are giving to the illegal migrants that come over here daily. Thousands of British are left homeless when they have tirelessly worked for this country.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for similar action: 

"Give British homeless same legal protection from destitution as asylum seekers" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/731681

You may also be interested in the following petitions:

"New programme of support & housing for homeless veterans"
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/744230

"All UK homeless citizens should be prioritised for hotel accommodation"
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/729887
